comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
Hi **@pborreli**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! You've already signed the contribution license agreement. Thanks!

The agreement was validated by Microsoft and real humans are currently evaluating your PR.

TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: I agree with fixing the other typos, but this is good.  File an issue or submit another PR.
